attributes.action: Don't allow a 2nd referendum to happen on EU regardless of the remain petition.
attributes.additional_details: The UK voted in the Referendum using the same Democratic process we havery always used. To overturn a majority vote now would undermine not only our democratic process, but the way we are viewed around the world. Let us stop this nonsense and move forward as an independent country together. Let us build a new independent Britain that is strong. One for our children to be proud of.
attributes.background:
On the 24th June 2016 it was announced that the majority vote in the UK referendum was to leave the EU.
Now the results have been released the remain campaigners have started a petition to stay regardless.
This petition is to make sure we continue to  leave the EU regardless of a petition to stay.
